description: This file defines a Qt6 application that displays a welcome widget with styled labels. It includes the implementation of the WelcomeWidget class constructor and the main() function that initializes and runs the application.

classes.name: WelcomeWidget
classes.description: A QWidget subclass that displays a welcome message with styled labels.

methods.name: WelcomeWidget::WelcomeWidget
methods.description: Constructor that creates a vertical layout with two styled labels.

methods.name: int main(int argc,char * argv[])
methods.description: Entry point of the application that initializes QApplication, creates a WelcomeWidget, and runs the event loop.
